page.title: 20Light Industry
page.content: The area lacks large-scale industrial development, but within it there are many large factories and works e.g. Plesseys . There is a variety of light industry in several Trading Estates, making goods ranging from foods to car headlights. There are relatively easy transportation facilities for high-value, low bulk goods and there is an abundant labour force available locally. The whole labour force is not utilised within the area, so some people must travel to work in the city of London or elsewhere in the county. Recent developments, including the M25, will hopefully encourage further industries into the area, especially in the quarternary sector.
